attributes.action: Reverse the cutbacks implemented in MRI scanner funding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: While the Prime Minister proudly announces more and more funding for the NHS (whilst at the same time increasing employer NI surcharges and adding greatly to the cost of our largest employer) funding for research into MRI interpretation which is done by universities has been cut savagely. Please sign up to condemn this injustice and help to build a healthier Britain
